info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 2 at 4:51PM CDT until April 2 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Lincoln IL
info.description:
* WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...Central and eastern Sangamon County.
* WHEN...Until 700 PM CDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 449 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen in 1 hour. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Springfield, Chatham, Auburn, Rochester, Riverton, Loami, Mechanicsburg, Dawson, Buffalo, Illinois State Fairgrounds, Jerome, Southern View, Leland Grove, Grandview, Spaulding, Thayer, Clear Lake, Glenarm and Lowder.
info.instruction:
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING
